mapper.select: select a.*, b.*, c.product_name, c.fk_category, d.lookup_name as category_name, e.po_no from delivery a inner join po e on e.pk_po = a.fk_po inner join delivery_detail b on a.pk_delivery = b.fk_delivery inner join product c on c.pk_product = b.fk_product inner join lookup d on d.pk_lookup = c.fk_category where a.pk_delivery = #{pkDelivery}
mapper.insert: insert into delivery ( delivery_no, delivery_date, fk_po, is_editable, created_date, created_by ) values ( #{deliveryNo}, #{deliveryDate}, #{fkPo}, #{isEditable}, #{createdDate}, #{createdBy} )
mapper.update: update delivery set is_editable = 'N' where fk_po = #{fkPo}
